tag_list: cto, busca-corp, entrepreneur, web-2-0, mentez, social-gaming, social-networks, advisor, general-manager
overview: Is an internet entrepreneur that started at the age of 17 years old. He founded q3latino.com his first gaming website, with the launch of his website he brought to Mexico the World Cyber Games also know as the Olympics for the e-sports. For the next years he continue evolving his websites who soon become Gamers.com.mx a website where you could get the latest information of the game you like. After 2 years of making Gamers.com.mx the #1 gaming website in Mexico, he sold it to the biggest retail store in Mexico. Before he sold Gamers he closed a contract with MSN.com to launch a new gaming website, LEVELUP was founded. LEVELUP quickly become the #1 gaming website in all Latin America, and just 2 years after the launch, Busca Corp acquired LEVELUP. Where Rodrigo became the CTO of the company. He was award twice Best Internet Website in Mexico by the Internet Mexican Association, he also lead the negotiations with MSN for LATAM and USA. Recently Rodrigo joined Mentez, a social gaming startup which The Next Web name it one of the 10 startups you should watch out in Latin America. Rodrigo is right now the CTO.

milestones.description: Joined Mentez as General Manager for Latin America

external_links.title: Interview to CTO & President of Busca Corp
